include-children.description: Specifies whether to get its child nodes' contents for a virtual document. * 'true', would include its child nodes' contents. * 'false', do not include its child nodes' contents, means only get this root node's contents.

binding-label.description: Specifies the version label to use to resolve late bound nodes for a virtual document.

include-broken.description: Specifies whether to include nodes with broken bindings for a virtual document. * 'true', would include nodes with broken bindings with current version. * 'false', do not include nodes with broken bindings.

depth.description: Specifies to what depth level the virtual document hierarchy will be returned. -1 means return the whole virtual document tree.

format.description: The format of the content uploaded.
